We provide a helper method which aims to make plotting indicators simple. For further information on the charting API please see our Charting section.

private LogReturn _logr;
// In Initialize()
_logr = LOGR(symbol, period);

// In OnData()
if (_logr.IsReady)
{
    Plot("My Indicators", "LOGR Warm Up Period", _logr.WarmUpPeriod);
    Plot("My Indicators", "LOGR Period", _logr.Period);
    Plot("My Indicators", "LOGR Is Ready", _logr.IsReady);
    Plot("My Indicators", "LOGR Current", _logr.Current);
    Plot("My Indicators", "LOGR Name", _logr.Name);
    Plot("My Indicators", "LOGR Samples", _logr.Samples);
}
# In Initialize()
self.logr = self.LOGR(symbol, period)

# In OnData()
if self.logr.IsReady:
    self.Plot("My Indicators", "LOGR Warm Up Period", self.logr.WarmUpPeriod);
    self.Plot("My Indicators", "LOGR Period", self.logr.Period);
    self.Plot("My Indicators", "LOGR Is Ready", self.logr.IsReady);
    self.Plot("My Indicators", "LOGR Current", self.logr.Current);
    self.Plot("My Indicators", "LOGR Name", self.logr.Name);
    self.Plot("My Indicators", "LOGR Samples", self.logr.Samples);
}
